comments:
Steps to repro:
1. Create blank java project
2. Create any of AWT or Swing example classes.
Visual editor tries to load file, but visual editor editorpart doesn't show 
anything.

In .log file i receive the following exception
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ve.java.core 4 0 ╤Б╨╡╨╜ 29, 2004 09:15:00.515
!MESSAGE Exception thrown.
!STACK 0
java.lang.ClassCastException
	at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.core.JavaSourceTranslator.
createJavaInstances(JavaSourceTranslator.java:705)
	at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.core.JavaSourceTranslator.
buildCompositionModel(JavaSourceTranslator.java:774)
	at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.core.JavaSourceTranslator.
decodeDocument(JavaSourceTranslator.java:881)
	at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.core.JavaSourceTranslator.
loadModel(JavaSourceTranslator.java:656)
	at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.editorpart.JavaVisualEditorPart$Setup.
run(JavaVisualEditorPart.java:1444)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:66)

Haven't checked for SWT components yet.

Also, when i try to create visual components they are shown, but after closing 
and reopening file in visual editor problem reproduces again.

Can you pleased unload the EMF examples plug-in?  This conflicts with the VE. 
There is a bugzilla 71473 to fix this.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 71473 ***
